name: jovo-sample-voice-app-nodejs
description: A sample voice app that works with the Jovo Framework

scripts.sync:prod: jovo get alexaSkill --skill-id amzn1.ask.skill.12319b98-d653-486d-bee4-9a8d5b85dc3c && jovo build -p alexaSkill --reverse
scripts.deploy:prod: docker-compose up --build && jovo build --stage prod && jovo deploy --stage prod
scripts.deploy:dev: docker-compose up --build && jovo build --stage dev && jovo deploy --stage dev

author: Jovo
